00031 class cObject;
00032 class cComponent;
00033 
00039 class SIM_API cException : public std::exception
00040 {
00041   protected:
00042     int errorcode;
00043     std::string msg;
00044     bool hascontext;
00045     std::string contextclassname;
00046     std::string contextfullpath;
00047     int moduleid;
00048 
00054     void init(const cObject *obj, OppErrorCode errorcode, const char *fmt, va_list va);
00055 
00056     // helper for init()
00057     void storeCtx();
00058 
00059     // default constructor, for subclasses only.
00060     cException();
00061 
00062     //
00063     // Helper, called from cException constructors.
00064     //
00065     // If an exception occurs in initialization code (during construction of
00066     // global objects, before main() is called), there's nobody who could
00067     // catch the error, so it would just cause a program abort.
00068     // Here we handle this case manually: if cException ctor is invoked before
00069     // main() has started, we print the error message and call exit(1).
00070     //
00071     void exitIfStartupError();
00072 
00073   public:
00081     cException(OppErrorCode errcode,...);
00082 
00086     cException(const char *msg,...);
00087 
00095     cException(const cObject *where, OppErrorCode errcode,...);
00096 
00102     cException(const cObject *where, const char *msg,...);
00103 
00108     cException(const cException&);
00109 
00114     virtual cException *dup() const {return new cException(*this);}
00115 
00119     virtual ~cException() throw() {}
00121 
00124 
00128     virtual int getErrorCode() const {return errorcode;}
00129 
00133     virtual const char *what() const throw() {return msg.c_str();}
00134 
00138     virtual void setMessage(const char *txt) {msg = txt;}
00139 
00143     virtual void prependMessage(const char *txt) {msg = std::string(txt) + ": " + msg;}
00144 
00150     virtual bool hasContext() const {return hascontext;}
00151 
00156     virtual const char *getContextClassName() const {return contextclassname.c_str();}
00157 
00162     virtual const char *getContextFullPath() const {return contextfullpath.c_str();}
00163 
00170     virtual int getModuleID() const {return moduleid;}
00172 };
00173

00183 {
00184   public:
00190     cTerminationException(OppErrorCode errcode,...);
00191 
00195     cTerminationException(const char *msg,...);
00196 
00201     cTerminationException(const cTerminationException& e) : cException(e) {}
00202 
00207     virtual cTerminationException *dup() const {return new cTerminationException(*this);}
00208 };

00219 {
00220   protected:

00264 };
